Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
bto.EntitiesProjectRelated.Enquiry
public class Enquiry extends Object
The Enquiry class represents a question or request for information submitted by an applicant. Enquiries can be related to a specific project or can be general enquiries about the BTO system. They track submission and response details including dates and respondent information.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(Applicant applicant, Project project, String enquiryContent)
      Constructor for creating a new enquiry. Sets the submission date to the current date and marks the enquiry as not responded.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant who submitted the enquiry
      project - The project the enquiry is about (can be null for general enquiries)
      enquiryContent - The content of the enquiry

  • Method Details

    • getEnquiryId

      public int getEnquiryId()
      Gets the unique identifier for this enquiry.
      Returns:
      The enquiry ID

    • setEnquiryId

      public void setEnquiryId(int enquiryId)
      Sets the unique identifier for this enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The enquiry ID to set

    • getApplicant

      public Applicant getApplicant()
      Gets the applicant who submitted this enquiry.
      Returns:
      The applicant who submitted the enquiry

    • setApplicant

      public void setApplicant(Applicant applicant)
      Sets the applicant who submitted this enquiry.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant to set

    • getProject

      public Project getProject()
      Gets the project this enquiry is about. Can be null for general enquiries not specific to any project.
      Returns:
      The project associated with the enquiry, or null if it's a general enquiry

    • setProject

      public void setProject(Project project)
      Sets the project this enquiry is about. Can be set to null for general enquiries.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to set

    • getEnquiryContent

      public String getEnquiryContent()
      Gets the content of the enquiry.
      Returns:
      The enquiry content

    • setEnquiryContent

      public void setEnquiryContent(String enquiryContent)
      Sets the content of the enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiryContent - The enquiry content to set

    • getResponse

      public String getResponse()
      Gets the response to this enquiry.
      Returns:
      The response text, or null if the enquiry has not been responded to

    • setResponse

      public void setResponse(String response)
      Sets the response to this enquiry. Also updates the isResponded flag and sets the response date to the current date if a non-empty response is provided.
      Parameters:
      response - The response text to set

    • getSubmissionDate

      public Date getSubmissionDate()
      Gets the date when the enquiry was submitted.
      Returns:
      The submission date

    • setSubmissionDate

      public void setSubmissionDate(Date submissionDate)
      Sets the date when the enquiry was submitted.
      Parameters:
      submissionDate - The submission date to set

    • getRespondedBy

      public User getRespondedBy()
      Gets the user (officer or manager) who responded to this enquiry.
      Returns:
      The user who responded, or null if the enquiry has not been responded to

    • setRespondedBy

      public void setRespondedBy(User respondedBy)
      Sets the user (officer or manager) who responded to this enquiry.
      Parameters:
      respondedBy - The user who responded

    • getResponseDate

      public Date getResponseDate()
      Gets the date when a response was provided.
      Returns:
      The response date, or null if the enquiry has not been responded to

    • setResponseDate

      public void setResponseDate(Date responseDate)
      Sets the date when a response was provided.
      Parameters:
      responseDate - The response date to set

    • isResponded

      public boolean isResponded()
      Checks if this enquiry has been responded to. Returns true if either the isResponded flag is set to true or if a non-empty response exists.
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry has been responded to, false otherwise

    • setResponded

      public void setResponded(boolean bool)
      Sets the responded status of this enquiry.
      Parameters:
      bool - The responded status to set

    • getMessage

      public String getMessage()
      Gets the enquiry content. This method is provided for backward compatibility with code that expects a getMessage() method.
      Returns:
      The enquiry content

    • getSubject

      public String getSubject()
      Gets a subject line for this enquiry. For project-specific enquiries, includes the project name. For general enquiries, returns "Enquiry about General Topics".
      Returns:
      A subject line for the enquiry

    • getSender

      public User getSender()
      Gets the applicant who submitted this enquiry as a User object. This method is provided for backward compatibility with ManagerInterface.
      Returns:
      The applicant who submitted the enquiry as a User object
